channel.title: Graphics Factory!
channel.description:
I Decided i would make a graphics shop where people can request signatures, avatars, and banners for other sites since you can't use here (unless GM or admin then you can use avatar here). Also you can join the shop as a sig and/or bannermaker. We do not use banner making sites that is ripping because it isn't your work. To make a request please follow this layout. [center][code]Size- Type of Request-(banner, Sig, Avatar) Text- Subtext- Extra-things like borders,colors and what ever else [/code][/center]
To join the Shop as a worker fill out this layout. [center][code]Why would you like to work for the shop. Do you have any graphics experience. Proof of experience.(sigs, avatars, banners etc.)[/code][/center]
Well hope you like my services. All requests will be taken.

item.title: Graphics Factory!
item.dc:creator: @zilchuary zilchuary
item.description:
@zilchuary wrote:

Type of Request-(banner, Sig, Avatar) background to client -.-
Text- Project-DS
Subtext- Made by Progect-DS development team
Extra-things like borders,colors and what ever else- can it be like a little dark red and blue color please

Read full topic
